references.paper_title: Lavie: High-quality video generation with cascaded latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it introduces LaVie, a high-quality video generation model using cascaded latent diffusion, which FreeLong directly extends and improves upon.

references.paper_title: Videocrafter2: Overcoming data limitations for high-quality video diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is significant because it introduces VideoCrafter2, another key short-video diffusion model that FreeLong uses as a foundation and enhances for long-video generation.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is foundational as it introduces high-resolution image synthesis using latent diffusion models, which is a key technique leveraged by many video diffusion methods, including those used in this paper.

references.paper_title: Video generation models as world simulators
references.reason: This work is among the most important because it introduces Sora, which is a key system mentioned in the introduction and represents the state-of-the-art in video generation.

references.paper_title: StreamingT2V: Consistent, dynamic, and extendable long video generation from text
references.reason: This is important as it introduces StreamingT2V, a method for long-video generation that FreeLong compares against showing the improvements offered by their method.
